member.name: T:NDceRpc.ServiceModel.ExceptionHandler
member.summary: Extend the class to create an exception handler for unhandled exceptions that occur within the NDceRpc runtime.

member.name: M:NDceRpc.ServiceModel.ExceptionHandler.HandleException(System.Exception)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns true if the exception has been handled, or false if the exception should be rethrown and the application terminated.
member.returns: true if the exception has been handled; otherwise, false.
member.param: The exception the occurred within the NDceRpc runtime and which may terminate the application.

member.name: P:NDceRpc.ServiceModel.ExceptionHandler.AlwaysHandle
member.summary: Gets an instance of that handles all exceptions.
member.returns: An object that returns true for all exceptions.

member.name: P:NDceRpc.ServiceModel.ExceptionHandler.AsynchronousThreadExceptionHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the current implementation for the application domain.
member.returns: Assign a custom object that receives unhandled exceptions that occur on asynchronous NDceRpc threads.

member.name: P:NDceRpc.ServiceModel.ExceptionHandler.TransportExceptionHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the current transport implementation for the application domain.
member.returns: A custom object that receives unhandled exceptions that occur within the global NDceRpc transports.

member.summary: Creates a name-based UUID using the algorithm from RFC 4122 ยง4.3.
